product_name: Spenco Total Support Thin Replacement Insoles
long_description: The Spenco Total Support Thin Replacement insoles are built for use in low-volume and minimalist shoes, and provide semi-flexible support for athletic pursuits. Topsheet features low-friction fabric to reduce blistering and has an antimicrobial treatment to deter odor development. Proprietary material at heels and forefeet absorbs shock and impact to provide comfort and cushioning. Molded thermoplastic urethane semi-flexibile stability cradles provide arch support and deep heel cupping for comfort through the stride. Middle EVA layer conforms to your feet with normal wear, matching the contours of your feet. Multicomponent system under heels delivers excellent shock absorption at heel strike; forefoot air crash pads offer extra cushioning under balls of feet. 3-POD(TM) system promotes healthy biomechanics; stiffer red POD counters overpronation while softer blue PODs help guide stride. Forefoot perforations increase ventilation for all-day comfort. Thickness at heels is 6.5mm; thickness at forefoot is 4.3mm.
short_description: The Spenco Total Support Thin Replacement insoles are built for use in low-volume and minimalist shoes, and provide semi-flexible support for athletic pursuits.
